name: Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire - Ultimate Collector's Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:
- Premium Box
- Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire Game
- Od Nua Statue (10" Approx)
- Metal Sticker
- Key Chain
- DLC: Beast of Winter, The Forgotten Sanctum and Seeker, Slayer, Survivor.
